item.title: Schedule Tracker
item.description: Schedule Tracker The main purpose of this project is to digitize the progress tracking I currently do with the help of my diary. Why did I choose this project? It’s fairly simple, and I haven’t built an end-to-end application before (other than the webhook tester). This project will include features like user accounts, logins, authentication, and more. Here’s a high-level overview of what I want to achieve: Sessions Tracking I usually track my daily progress using sessions.
